alert.note: Alert for Northern Harrison; Northern Jackson; Southern Harrison; Southern Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 5:37AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Harrison and southwestern Jackson Counties through 615 AM CDT... At 536 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout over St. Martin, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, winds in excess of 30 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Biloxi, Ocean Springs, St. Martin, Gautier, D`iberville, Latimer, Gulf Hills, Gulf Park Estates and Vancleave. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 42 and 60. Interstate 110 in Mississippi between mile markers 1 and 4. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Harrison; Northern Jackson; Southern Harrison; Southern Jackson
